xml_element.name: check_folders
xml_element.title: Check hot folders for configuration files
xml_element.author: $Author: ap $

description.p: Checks the configuration directories for changes and updates the respective objects in the JobScheduler. On Windows operating systems changes to a directory are noticed immediately, on Unix systems this could take up to 60 seconds.

The command is available in the built-in HTML interface and is used. for example, when developing jobs for Unix in order to shorten the waiting time until changes to the configuration are noticed by the JobScheduler.
